author: claudep
message:
Fixed #19464 -- Eased customization of ClearableFileInput's link markup

Thanks rubyruy for the report and the patch.

files.patch: @@ -331,6 +331,8 @@ class ClearableFileInput(FileInput): template_with_clear = '%(clear)s ' + url_markup_template = '{1}' + def clear_checkbox_name(self, name): """ Given the name of the file input, return the name of the clear checkbox @@ -356,7 +358,7 @@ def render(self, name, value, attrs=None): if value and hasattr(value, "url"): template = self.template_with_initial - substitutions['initial'] = format_html('{1}', + substitutions['initial'] = format_html(self.url_markup_template, value.url, force_text(value)) if not self.is_required:
